patterns: What is SRM Institute of Science and Technology
What kind of institute is SRM
What is special about SRM NCR
responses: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Delhi NCR Campus was established in 1997 in Modinagar, Ghaziabad, UP. We are a premier deemed university approved by UGC, PCI, and AICTE offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in Engineering, Technology, Management, Computer Applications, Pharmacy, and Hotel Management. Our campus houses over 5,000 students and 200+ faculty members.

SRMIST Delhi NCR Campus is part of the renowned SRM Group of Educational Institutions. Located in Ghaziabad, UP, we've been providing quality education since 1997. We offer diverse programs across multiple disciplines with state-of-the-art infrastructure spread over 27.14 acres and excellent placement records with highest package of ‚Çπ29 LPA.

SRM NCR Campus is a deemed university accredited with A++ Grade by NAAC, established in 1997. We're located on Delhi-Meerut Road, Modinagar, Ghaziabad. Our mission is to emerge as a world-class university creating and disseminating knowledge for the betterment of mankind with over 5,000 students and 200+ faculty members.

Welcome to SRMIST Delhi NCR! We are a leading educational institution with over 25 years of excellence in education. Our campus spans 27.14 acres with modern facilities including advanced laboratories, well-equipped library with 38,734+ books, sports complex, and comfortable hostel facilities for 1800+ students for holistic student development.

**Step 1: Online Application**
